title: Lighthouse
body:
And [C] I don't know if [F] I can do
[G] Anything with[C]out you
And [C] I don't know if [F] I can do
[G] Anything at [C] all

[Am] I got nothing left to [F] do
For [C] you, my [G] love

bodyLyrics:
And I don't know if I can do
Anything without you
And I don't know if I can do
Anything at all

I got nothing left to do
For you, my love
And I got nothing left to say
To you, my love

And I don't know if I can do
Anything without you
And I don't know if I can do
Anything at all

And now we sleep tight on the beachside
Pretending that we're just fine 
And now we sleep tight on the beachside
Pretending that we're just fine 

I have bet everything
On our love, I can't rise above
And now I'm sure that I can't do
Anything about you

And I don't know if I can do
Anything without you
And I don't know if I can do
Anything at all

And now we sleep tight on the beachside
Pretending that we're just fine
